thread.section_title: procivic.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of procivic.com | procivic.com | 3 of 78
thread.title: Dylan Cook

author: Dylan Cook
title: Dylan Cook
text: I order an item from procivic and the only thing they were quick about was taking the money from my account. I placed my order and gave them two days before I started asking for a shipping confirmation and I did every day for a week and they gave me the same response. "You should have a tracking number by the end of the day or tomorrow morning" it took a week to get a shipping confirmation and now the tracking number has said for a week that only a shipping lable has been made.. no shipping yet.. terrible service through them so far.
